column1: Requirement
As a user, I want to sign up with my mobile number and email so that I can create a new account.
As a customer, I want to view my transaction history so that I can monitor past payments.
As a manager, I want to export project status reports in PDF format so that I can share them with stakeholders.
As an admin, I want to approve leave requests submitted by employees so that the HR system stays updated.
As a user, I want to receive real-time notifications when my order is dispatched.
As a student, I want to upload my assignment file so that my instructor can review it.
As a user, I want to reset my password via an OTP sent to my phone so that I can regain access.
As an admin, I want to schedule daily database backups so that critical data is preserved.
As a doctor, I want to update patient prescriptions in the system for the next appointment.
As a user, I want to search for nearby service centers using location access.
The system should respond to user actions within 2 seconds for all major operations.
The application should support up to 5000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
The platform must maintain 99.9% uptime availability during business hours.
The mobile app should load the dashboard in less than 3 seconds on 4G networks.
All sensitive data should be encrypted at rest and in transit using AES-256.
The API gateway should process 100 requests per second without timeout errors.
The system should auto-scale during high load periods to maintain responsiveness.
The web application should support both light and dark themes for better usability.
All modules should log events for audit tracking and compliance reporting.
The software should be compatible across Chrome, Edge, Safari, and Firefox browsers.
The system should reject invalid login attempts after five consecutive failures.
The application should display an error if a required form field is left blank.
The system should not allow deletion of an active record without confirmation.
The payment gateway should block expired or invalid credit cards during checkout.
The API should return a 400 Bad Request error when a malformed payload is received.
The application should prevent file uploads exceeding 20 MB in size.
The system should show an appropriate error when the database connection is lost.
The app should gracefully handle timeouts during external service calls.
The software should log and report unhandled exceptions automatically.
The system should restrict access to unauthorized users attempting to open admin pages.
